site.title: Attractions Hub
site.description: Discover amazing attractions around the world

hero.title: Welcome to Attractions Hub
hero.subtitle: Discover the world's most incredible attractions, from natural wonders to architectural marvels.

features.title: Why Choose Attractions Hub?
features.subtitle: We provide comprehensive information about the world's best attractions to help you plan your perfect adventure.

discover.title: Discover Locations
discover.description: Find amazing attractions near you or in destinations you're planning to visit.

information.title: Detailed Information
information.description: Get comprehensive details about each attraction including hours, prices, and tips.

favorites.title: Personal Favorites
favorites.description: Save your favorite attractions and create personalized travel itineraries.

cta.title: Ready to Start Exploring?
cta.subtitle: Browse through our curated list of world-class attractions and start planning your next adventure today.

header.title: World Attractions
header.subtitle: Explore our curated collection of the world's most amazing attractions, from natural wonders to iconic landmarks.

nature.title: Natural Wonder Parks
nature.description: Discover breathtaking national parks featuring stunning landscapes, diverse wildlife, and pristine natural beauty.

historic.title: Historic Landmarks
historic.description: Explore iconic historical sites and architectural marvels that tell the story of human civilization.

entertainment.title: Entertainment Districts
entertainment.description: Experience vibrant entertainment areas with theme parks, museums, theaters, and cultural attractions.

scenic.title: Scenic Viewpoints
scenic.description: Find the most spectacular viewpoints and observation decks offering panoramic views and photo opportunities.

coastal.title: Coastal Attractions
coastal.description: Explore beautiful coastlines, pristine beaches, marine sanctuaries, and waterfront destinations.

cultural.title: Cultural Centers
cultural.description: Immerse yourself in local culture through art galleries, cultural centers, and traditional experiences.

company.title: Attractions Hub
company.description: Your gateway to discovering the world's most amazing attractions and destinations.
